product_name: MaryJanesFarm Organic Shepherd's Meat Pie - Single Serving
long_description: MaryJanesFarm Shepherd's Meat Pie is easily prepared at your backcountry campsite and features a tasty mixture of organic potatoes, organic ground beef and organic cheddar cheese.
short_description: MaryJanesFarm Shepherd's Meat Pie is easily prepared at your backcountry campsite and features a tasty mixture of organic potatoes, organic ground beef and organic cheddar cheese.
